author: spencer_tb
content:
All our `eth_config` tests on all ELs are passing âœ… (versions on the blog post):
```
reth/v1.9.3-27a8c0f/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
erigon/3.3.0/linux-amd64/go1.25.4
besu/v25.11.0/linux-x86_64/openjdk-java-21
Nethermind/v1.35.3+d9febbce/linux-x64/dotnet9.0.10
Geth/v1.16.7-stable-b9f3a3d9/linux-amd64/go1.24.9
```
So all EL clients are configured with:
```
current: Prague
next: Osaka
last: BPO2
```

After/at the fork we will run again to confirm the following (and similarly after each BPO):
```
current: Osaka
next: BPO1
last: BPO2
```

author: samcm
